detaileddescription.para: Get the version number of the TwoLAME library. eg "0.3.1".

simplesect.para: The version number as a C string

detaileddescription.para: Get the URL of the TwoLAME homepage. eg "http://www.twolame.org/".

simplesect.para: The url as a C string

detaileddescription.para: Get the number of bytes per MPEG audio frame, for current settings.

simplesect.para: the number of bytes per frame

detaileddescription.para: Print the library version and encoder parameter settings to STDERR.
Will display differnent ammounts of information depending on the verbosity setting. If verbosity is set to 0 then no message will be displayed.
